title: Riverside
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Asian, Laotian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu includes a range of vegetarian and vegan dishes listed explicitly. Some of the non-veg stuff may be requested without meat/fish/eggs. Not to be confuse with the other restaurant, RiverView, which does not cater to or care for alternative diets.
